mstts:express-as.prosody: In todays episode we set the ground for season one and you get to know who we are.

voice.name: en-US-AmberNeural
voice.prosody: This is our warm up as a 'Hello World' in front of a bigger audience. We're looking forward to develop a audio format that shows us backgrounds to technologys we nowadays take for granted. But hey John!
tell me what it is for you?

mstts:express-as.prosody: ? For me it's a format to hear storys of a recent history. A history that I have not always been part of but still it connects to me and my life. But I would like to forward that question to our producer. Take it away Stefan.

voice.name: en-GB-RyanNeural
voice.prosody: and Sara. We plan to produce a podcast where we put a spotlight on the recent history of computers. We wrap up historical facts about commmunicating technology and in short episodes we talk about the history to hopefully understand the future.

voice.name: en-US-AmberNeural
voice.prosody: The parser is a computer generated production that is written in text and output for you as audio.

mstts:express-as.prosody: If you like the format, hear mistakes or have suggestions for improvement, please visit our website and comment. We understand this podcast in an itterative way.

voice.name: en-GB-RyanNeural
voice.prosody: Starting in 2022 you will get season one about the first steps of sounds on the internet. Stay tuned.
